titles.title: HP448 How glorious Zion's courts appear

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
How glorious Zion's courts appear,
The city of our God!
His throne he has established here,
Here fixed his loved abode.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Its walls, defended by his grace,
No power shall e'er o'erthrow;
Salvation is its bulwark sure
Against the assailing foe.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Lift up the everlasting gates,
The doors wide open fling;
Enter, ye nations, who obey
The statutes of our King.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Here those whose minds are stayed on thee
Are kept in perfect peace:
They who have known Jehovah's name
And trusted in his grace.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Trust in the Lord, for ever trust,
And banish all your fears;
Strength in the Lord Jehovah dwells
Eternal as his years.
